original_text: the film's implicit premise is that the faith of the tonga people is in every way inferior to that of john .
generated_text:
1. "The movie's underlying message is that the cultural practices of the Maori people are inferior to those of the Western world."
2. "The film's subtle implication is that the spiritual beliefs of the African tribe are less valid than those of the Christian missionaries."
